owltools.ncbi
Class NCBIConverter

java.lang.Object
  owltools.ncbi.OWLConverter
      owltools.ncbi.NCBIConverter
Direct Known Subclasses:
NCBI2OWL, NCBIOWL
public class NCBIConverter
extends OWLConverter

Provides common methods for working with NCBI.

Author:
James A. Overton

createNCBIIRI

protected static org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.IRI createNCBIIRI(String id)
Create an NCBI taxon IRI from an NCBI ID string.

Parameters:
id - the ID string
Returns:
an IRI of the form http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/NCBITaxon_1

Create an NCBI taxon IRI from an NCBI ID integer.

Parameters:
id - the numeric ID
Returns:

assertSubClass

                                                                                org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass child,
                                                                                String parentID)
Convenience method for asserting a subClass relation between a parent and child class in an ontology.

Parameters:
ontology - the current ontology
child - the child class
parentID - the NCBI ID of the parent class
Returns:
the axiom

getTaxonID

public static String getTaxonID(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass taxon)
Get the NCBI Taxonomy ID of an OWL Class.

Parameters:
taxon - the class
Returns:
null or the NCBI Taxonomy ID as a string

createTaxon

public static org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass createTaxon(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology ontology,
                                                                String id)
Create a class for an NCBI Taxonomy ID and add it to the ontology.

Parameters:
ontology - the current ontology
id - the NCBI Taxonomy ID, will be expanded into an IRI of the form http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/NCBITaxon_1
Returns:
the new class

checkTaxon

public static Boolean checkTaxon(org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntology ontology,
                                 org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLClass taxon)
Check to make sure that this taxon has the required properties.
  • label exists
  • exactly one superClass

Parameters:
ontology - the current ontology
taxon - the subject
Returns:
true if the check succeeds, otherwise false.
